rooms.description: A welcoming lobby with Vastu considerations ensuring positive energy flow and proper alignment of the entrance.
Open space for living and dining, with ample natural light and Vastu-aligned placement to encourage social interaction.
Modern kitchen designed with efficiency in mind, placed on the east side as per Vastu for prosperity and health.
Spacious bedroom featuring a large balcony for ventilation, privacy, and relaxation; oriented to face the east or north according to Vastu guidelines.
Secondary bedroom with a smaller balcony, designed as an occasional guest room while maintaining good energy flow per Vastu principles.

openings.description: A grand entrance aligned with the north to invite positive energy and adhere to traditional Vastu principles.
A spacious balcony ensuring good ventilation and natural light in accordance with Vastu.
A balcony for the guest bedroom providing a refreshing outdoor space and following Vastu norms.
